en.no-console: This command can be only executed by in-game players!
en.region-defining-error: Sorry but you aren't defining any region!
en.region-created:
Region '%rname%' successfully defined!
§rNow you can edit the flags using
en.error-already: Error: you already have a region called
en.not-defined-region: Error: you haven't defined the pos1 with /wg pos1 or you are not defining a region!
en.error-region-command-args:
Error!
At least 1 argument is expected with the command /region!
en.no-name-defined: Error: you have not defined a name!
en.already-defining-error:
Error: it seems that you are already defining a region!
Please finish the definition and try again!
en.create-success:
Success!
To define the region plase use /wg pos1 and /wg pos2!
en.region-not-found: Error: region '%rname%' does not exists in this server!
en.region-deleted:
Success!
The region '%rname%' has been successfully deleted!
en.flag-removed:
Success!
Flag '%flagname%' successfully removed for region
en.flag-added:
Success!
Flag '%flagname%' successfully added for region
en.player-added:
Success!
Player %pname% successfully added to region whitelist!
en.player-removed:
Success!
Player %pname% successfully removed from region whitelist!
